title: Simon Property Earnings, Revenue Beat in Q3
text:
Investing.com - Simon Property reported third quarter earnings that beat analysts' expectations on Wednesday and revenue that topped forecasts.

The firm reported earnings per share of $3.05 on revenue of $1.42B. Analysts polled by Investing.com anticipated EPS of $1.75 on revenue of $1.31B. That compared to EPS of $1.8 on revenue of $1.41B in the same period a year earlier. The company had reported EPS of $1.6 on revenue of $1.4B in the previous quarter.





Simon Property follows other major Services sector earnings this month

On October 24, Amazon.com reported third quarter EPS of $4.23 on revenue of $69.98B, compared to forecasts of EPS of $4.61 on revenue of $68.83B.

Visa A earnings beat analysts' expectations on October 24, with fourth quarter EPS of $1.47 on revenue of $6.14B. Investing.com analysts expected EPS of $1.43 on revenue of $6.08B
